subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Paul Lo Duca, after a two-week stint on the disabled list, rejoined the Mets’ lineup for Monday’s game against the Phillies. Luis Castillo also returned.
snippet: Paul Lo Duca, after a two-week stint on the disabled list, rejoined the Mets’ lineup for Monday’s game against the Phillies. Luis Castillo also returned.
